total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern of the number 8 in the input grid.
Q2: Determine the rules for changing the number 8 to another number in the output grid.
Q3: Identify the relationship between the position of the number 8 in the input grid and the number it changes to in the output grid.
Q4: Apply the rules identified in Q2 and Q3 to the input grid of the quiz to generate the output grid.

Q2: Determine the rules for changing the number 8 to a different number in the output grid.
